articles.title: Ayman al-Zawahiri: Al-Qaeda leader killed in US drone strike - BBC
articles.description: Ayman al-Zawahiri helped plan the 9/11 attacks and was among America's most wanted men.
articles.content:
By Robert Plummer & Matt MurphyBBC News
The US has killed the leader of al-Qaeda, Ayman al-Zawahiri, in a drone strike in Afghanistan, President Joe Biden has confirmed.
He was killed in a coun… [+4703 chars]

articles.title: NASA Shares Largest-Ever Image Of Andromeda Galaxy, Internet Calls It "Extraordinarily Beautiful" - NDTV
articles.description: American space agency NASA on Sunday shared the "largest-ever" image assembled of the Andromeda galaxy by the Hubble Space Telescope. The picture was captured seven years ago and it is the sharpest large composite image ever taken of the galaxy.
articles.content:
Image shows the 48,000-light-year-long stretch of the Andromeda galaxy.
American space agency NASA on Sunday shared the "largest-ever" image assembled of the Andromeda galaxy by the Hubble Space Tel… [+1904 chars]

articles.title: Sega Genesis Mini 2 North American Release Will Be a Tenth of the Original - IGN - IGN
articles.description: If you want a Sega Genesis Mini 2, you'll strangely have to turn to Amazon Japan, as western customers will have to import Sega's next mini console.
